title: To provide for a study regarding the proximity of federally assisted housing to hazardous waste sites.
content: Environmental Justice in Federally Assisted Housing Act - Establishes the Advisory Commission on the Proximity of Hazardous Waste Sites to Federally Assisted Housing which shall conduct a study and report regarding: (1) the extent and proximity of federally assisted housing to hazardous waste sites, and (2) related health risks and illness histories.
